pages.text: The standard class loadout is the most basic loadout, it provides the basic items and weapons needed to begin.$(br)When starting a match it is highly recommended to have at least one standard class teammate in your team.$(br)
The items it gives you are the following.$(br)$(li1)Pistol$(li1)Rifle$(li1)Remote Detonator$(li1)Armor$(li1)48 Grenades$(li1)128 Ammo$(li1)8 Ammo Pods$(li1)The Reset Rod$(li1)The Tablet
